name: Motel Massacre
description:
You are a detective that receives an urgent phone call while staying at a motel. You are informed that an untrustworthy citizen is right outside your building and you must figure out who that citizen is to stop them. Luckily, you have your trusty rifle to with you to stop the traitor. You only have one shot though, so you better aim for the right citizen.

This is my submission for the 2022 VR Jam.

(The PC build has been updated to work with SteamVR and Oculus)
